target.title: Device ID
target.description: Device identifier on which action is created.

process_match_values.title: Process match values
process_match_values.description: List of values that are used to match process to kill. Depending on selected strategy it might be list of identifiers, names or regular expressions.

process_memory_dump.title: Process memory dump
process_memory_dump.description: Whether to run memory dump on process before killing it.

memory_dump_flag.title: Memory dump flag
memory_dump_flag.description: full - memory dump includes all accessible memory of process, pmem - only information necessary to capture process' stack traces
